item.title: Could Cristiano Ronaldo Retire After Potential New Contract Through 2027?

item.title: Welcome Back! Eric Bieniemy Replaces Matt Nagy as Chiefs Offensive Coordinator
item.description: The Kansas City Chiefs hired Eric Bieniemy as their offensive coordinator, reuniting him with Andy Reid and Patrick Mahomes.

item.title: Texas QB Arch Manning Undergoes Foot Surgery, Expected Back for Spring Practice
item.description: Texas QB Arch Manning underwent minor foot surgery, but he's expected back for Longhorns' spring practice.
